Skills.Name: Black Spin/Throw
Skills.Description:
Inflicts <color=red>{0}%</color> DMG on single enemy with lowest DEF.
Further lowers ATK by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 5s.
Skills.ShortDescription:
Inflicts DMG, lowers ATK of
single enemy

Skills.Name: Sword's Dance
Skills.Description:
Raises DEF of allies within 100 cm of self by <color=red>{0}%</color>
for 10s. Recovers own HP by <color=red>{1}%</color> of ATK.
Skills.ShortDescription:
Raises DEF of allies within
range. Recovers own HP

Skills.Name: Strike Combo
Skills.Description: Reduces DMG Received for all allies by <color=red>5.00%-40.00%</color> for 5s according to Combo Bonus. Inflicts 100.00% DMG.
Skills.ShortDescription: Reduces DMG Received for all allies, inflicts DMG on single enemy

Skills.Name: Shadow Encounter
Skills.Description: At start of Wave, raises ACC of Red Elemental allies (behind self) by <color=red>{0}%</color>. (Permanent)
Skills.ShortDescription:
At start of Wave, raises
ACC of Red Elemental allies
behind self

Skills.Name: Shadow Encounter: Alpha Only
Skills.Description: Each time own HP is recovered (CT 5s), raises DMG Inflicted for all allies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 15s. Further shields DMG (<color=red>{1}%</color> of skill user's ATK) for 60s.
Skills.ShortDescription: no translation_自分のHPが回復する度に、味方全体の与ダメージをアップし、さらにシールドを付与
